nodes.text: Fetya's Hollow was a town located on Arvina, where the Besalisk arms dealer Fetya resided during the Imperial Era. The cyborg Beilert Valance and his team visited the town during their hunt for the Sith Lord Darth Vader, seeking to purchase weapons from Fetya. When Fetya and her associates turned on Valance's crew, the latter escaped the world when the Galactic Empire arrived and began attacking the town.
Located on the Outer Rim world of Arvina, Fetya's Hollow was a desolate town with at least one firearms store run by the Besalisk arms dealer Fetya.

During the Imperial Era, Fetya resided in Fetya's Hollow, selling arms from the area. During their hunt for the Sith Lord Darth Vader at some point prior to the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, the cyborg Beilert Valance and his team of bounty hunters travelled to Fetya's Follow and visited Fetya, looking to purchase sonic cannons from her. The deal went sour when she turned on Valance and his team and intended to kill them as the cyborg had previously failed to complete a job with the Besalisk in the past.

However, Valance had allowed the Galactic Empire to track them down, and Vader immediately arrived in an Imperial-class Star Destroyer, which razed the town completely. Valance and his crew then fought their way through Fetya's associates in the ensuing chaos and escaped the world aboard the cyborg's starship, the Broken Wing. Following the skirmish, Vader interrogated Fetya for information on the Hidden Hand and subsequently killed her.

Fetya's Hollow appeared in the second issue of the 2019 comic-book miniseries Star Wars: Target Vader, written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Stefano Landini, and published by Marvel Comics on August 14, 2019.
